About

Hello, I'm Eric. I am a passionate student with experience in creating modern and efficient web applications. I love learning new technologies and continuously improving my skills through projects. Although I am currently studying officially, I also enjoy learning in a self-taught manner to complement my knowledge. In my free time, I enjoy working on personal programming projects, playing video games, and going to the cinema.
